text: Phan Thanh Giản or Phan Thanh Jan(潘淸簡, 1796 - 1867) was a Vietnamese politician, diplomat and historian. He was Vietnam's diplomat in France, the war. == Book == * 《欽定越史通鑑綱目》 Category:1796 births Category:1867 deaths Category:Suicides by poison Category:Vietnamese politicians Category:Asian diplomats Category:Vietnamese writers
title: Phan Thanh Giản
